data.fullContent: Candice used to be a soccer player until she decided to retire and start a new career. She decided to focus her energy on studying fashion, her true passion. After some time, she was able to start fashion designing and was excited to show everyone her creations. She held a fashion show where she presented her collection to the public. The reaction to her clothes was great, and they sold out. People were thrilled by her designs and couldn't wait to wear them. With the money she made, she was able to open a small shop for her designs.

q1.translation: 坎迪斯曾经是一名足球运动员，直到她决定退役，开始新的职业生涯。她决定把精力集中在她真正热爱的时尚研究上。过了一段时间，她开始从事时装设计，并很兴奋地向大家展示她的创作。她举办了一场时装秀，向公众展示了她的时装系列。她的衣服反响很好，都卖光了。人们为她的设计感到兴奋，迫不及待地想要穿上它们。
